Package fr.epita.quiz_manager.datamodel

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MCQChoice
    Description This MCQChoice class is used to model multiple questions choices, it includes 4 fields and indicates parameters to be persisted in the DB as the id, for being a PKt Usage This class should be used as follows: private MCQChoice instance = new MCQChoice();
    Question
    Description This Question class is used to model questions, it includes 3 properties, uses queries predefined in the applicationContext Usage This class should be used as follows: private Question instance;
    Quiz
    Description This Quiz class is used to model quizzes, it includes 3 fields: Integer id; String name; Set <Question> questionList; Usage This class should be used as follows: private Quiz instance;
    User
    Description This User class is used to model possible users for the system, it includes 5 fields and indicates parameters to be persisted in the DB Usage This class should be used as follows: private User instance;
    UserQuiz
    Description This UserQuiz class is used to model a special kind of quizzes, which are quizzes taken by a User , it includes 5 fields: Integer id; User user; List<MCQChoice> answers; Quiz quiz; Double score; Usage This class should be used as follows: private UserQuiz instance;
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    QuestionType
    Description This is an enum QuestionType, defined to set a property of a Question to call either a MCQ, OPEN or ASSOCIATIVE constructor
    UserType
    Description This is an enum UserType, defined to set a property of a User to define 0 or 1 or VERBOSE values STUDENT, ADMIN
